com.paypal.selion.reports.runtime

Class SeLionReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.selion.reports.runtime.SeLionReporter

  • public final class SeLionReporter
extends Object
    A TestNG compatible message logger. Use this class to log messages to the report output and associate them with a Test, WebTest and/or MobileTest

        1. Provides saver with path to output information.
        2. Initializes saver.
        3. Creates if missing output directories.

      • createLog

        protected BaseLog createLog(boolean saveSrc)
        Creates an instance of BaseLog. Calls any LogActions which are hooked in.
        Parameters:
        saveSrc - Save the current page source true/false. Requires an active Grid session.
        Returns:
        A BaseLog subclass that represents the actual log that was generated.

      • generateLog

        protected void generateLog(boolean takeScreenshot,
                           boolean saveSrc)
        Generate a log message and send it to the TestNG Reporter
        Parameters:
        takeScreenshot - Take a screenshot true/false. Requires an active Grid session.
        saveSrc - Save the current page source true/false. Requires an active Grid session.

      • addLogAction

        public static void addLogAction(LogAction action)
        Parameters:
        action - A LogAction object that represents the custom log action to be invoked when log(String, boolean, boolean) gets called.
